mapper.select:
SELECT a.jiesId,a.jiesjcsj,a.jieswgsj,a.jieswxje,b.`jiescph` FROM `jies` a JOIN `khcl` b ON a.khclId=b.`khclId` WHERE a.`bz1`=0
AND b.jiescph=#{chepaihao}

SELECT a.jiesId,a.jiesjcsj,a.jieswgsj,a.jieswxje,b.`jiescph` FROM `jies` a JOIN `khcl` b ON a.khclId=b.`khclId` WHERE a.`bz1`=1
AND b.jiescph=#{chepaihao}
mapper.sql: jiesId, khclId, jiesjcsj, jieswgsj, jieswxje, jiesshje, jiesfy, bz1, bz2, bz3
mapper.insert:
insert into jies
jiesId,
khclId,
jiesjcsj,
jieswgsj,
jieswxje,
jiesshje,
jiesfy,
bz1,
bz2,
bz3,
#{jiesid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{khclid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jiesjcsj,jdbcType=DATE},
#{jieswgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
#{jieswxje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jiesshje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jiesfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{bz1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bz2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bz3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update jies
khclId = #{khclid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jiesjcsj = #{jiesjcsj,jdbcType=DATE},
jieswgsj = #{jieswgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
jieswxje = #{jieswxje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
jiesshje = #{jiesshje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
jiesfy = #{jiesfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bz1 = #{bz1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bz2 = #{bz2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bz3 = #{bz3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where jiesId = #{jiesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jies set khclId = #{khclid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jiesjcsj = #{jiesjcsj,jdbcType=DATE}, jieswgsj = #{jieswgsj,jdbcType=DATE}, jieswxje = #{jieswxje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, jiesshje = #{jiesshje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, jiesfy = #{jiesfy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bz1 = #{bz1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bz2 = #{bz2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bz3 = #{bz3,jdbcType=INTEGER} where jiesId = #{jiesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
